Description:
LOCATION AND CONVENIENCE AT ITS BEST!!
Century21, Wyndham City proudly presents you this beautiful family home located in the ever growing area of Tarneit. This contemporary home is sure to be a delight for both first home buyers or investors alike!
Grab this ultimate opportunity to secure this beautiful home which enjoys quick and convenient access to everything including schools, shopping centres, child care centres and public transport which will surely be your favourite.
Comprising:
- 4 light filled generous sized bedrooms, master bedroom with full en suite and walk in robe and the other 3 bedrooms with built in robes.
- Practical open floor plan.
- Spacious kitchen overlooking dining and living area.
- Formal lounge or light filled open plan living area.
-Generous sized backyard to enjoy all year round entertainment.
- Extras include ducted heating, solar panels, remote control double car garage, spacious laundry, low maintenance front yard and so much more!
Ideal for everyone's needs this house has a lot to offer that you would not want to miss!!
CALL MRIDU ON 0424 658 510 TO BOOK AN INSPECTION NOW!
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List:
www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Please contact us immediately for more information.

Description:
Prime Locaton! Government Grants Available !!
OKAS Property Group Derrimut presents an excellent opportunity for anybody to claim.
This block is located just minutes away from schools and child care facilities ranging from early care to secondary education institutions, as well as just a short drive to the Tarneit Central shopping centre ,Wyndham village Shopping Centre. Close to Tarneit train station and Williams Landing train station.
This land is situated in an area rich with parks and community features which are sure to turn this area into the home you've always been looking for, or the perfect make it a prime candidate for a well desired investment property.
Key Features :
# Perfect Rectangular block
# 5% Deposit is accepted
# Expected Title in Dec 2020
# Home Builder grant $25,000 is available
# First home owner eligible for $35,0000
Opportunities like this don't last forever!
If this sounds interesting to you don't hesitate to call Nirav on 0433 795 640 or Vish on 0449 919 191.

Description:
Zoned to Werribee Secondary College!
Aman Jadaun & Ray White exclusively presents a stunning brand-new family home boasting a six-star energy rating that will sway you the moment you enter with its class and superior finishes. Superlatively built and located in the most desirable part of the prestigious River walk Estate, this is an exceptional opportunity to make your paramount property investment decision.
Superbly built, this special home boasts 4 expansive bedrooms, multiple living areas, two beautifully appointed bathrooms ,a stunning designer kitchen with Walk-in-Pantry and 40 mm Stone bench tops, a delightful open plan living/dining area leading out to a sun filled alfresco area for all year round entertainment.
Additional to the grand sized master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe there are a further 3 large sized bedrooms all with Built in robes as well as a study area and Multiple Linen/ Storage
Key features to this home include:
*4 bedrooms, 2 living, 2 bathroom plus study nook and outdoor entertainment Alfresco area.
*Double Door Grand Entrance
*High Ceiling with Raised Doors
*Ducted heating and evaporative cooling
*900mm Appliances
*Floating Floor Boards through out
*Full landscaping
*Exposed aggregate driveway and Concrete paths
*And much more
Zoned to Werribee Secondary College and Estates Own River walk primary school and future town centres, direct freeway access, Watton Street Shopping District and Werribee train station all within Short distance add value to the already growing and developed area. This ideally located exceptional opportunity is well timed and certainly not to be missed. Call Aman on 0410 158 156 to arrange an inspection as this dream home truly won't last long.
Disclaimer: We have in preparing this document used our best endeavours to ensure that the information contained in this document is true and accurate, but accept no responsibility and disclaim all liability in respect to any errors, omissions, inaccuracies or misstatements in this document. Prospect purchasers should make their own inquiries to verify the information contained in this document. Purchasers should make their own inquiries and refer to the due diligence checklist provided by Consumer Affairs. Click on the link for a copy of the due diligence checklist from Consumer Affairs. http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Internal area
284.09m²

Description:
ACT QUICK ON THIS ONE
**Private Inspections strictly by appointment only**
Please call Andrew 0432 526 844 or Stephen 0402 012 554 to book your private inspection time slot!
Set in a family friendly court of Burnside Heights sits this perfect opportunity zoned for Kororoit Creek Primary School and only moments away from public transport, gorgeous park lands, jogging track, quality secondary schools, Caroline Springs Town Center, Watervale shopping center and nearby train stations. Grasp this great opportunity to enter into the fast-growing market of Burnside Heights.
Features Include:
Master bedroom showcasing a walk-in wardrobe and ensuite with quality fittings
Additional two spacious bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
Home office/study
Front formal lounge
The open plan kitchen is located perfectly to incorporate the meals and family area allowing ample space for entertaining family and friends
Kitchen complete with caesar stone bench tops, ample cupboard space, stainless steel appliances including 900mm free standing oven with gas cook top, double sink, range hood and dishwasher
Central bathroom with bathtub and quality fittings
Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ducted vacuum, roller shutters, alarm system and water tank
Professional landscaped gardens to the front and rear of the property
Double car garage on remote with drive through and internal access
For more information or to make an appointment to inspect the property please call Andrew Migliorisi on 0432 526 844 or Stephen Azzopardi on 0402 012 554
Alternatively, if you or your family are considering selling a property or if the purchase is dependent on the current value of an existing property, Id be more than happy to offer you a current realistic free market appraisal.
(Photo ID is Required at all Open For Inspections, Prior to Entry)
At YPA Caroline Springs Our Service Will Move You
DISCLAIMER: Every precaution has been taken to establish the accuracy of the above information but it does not constitute any representation by the vendor or agent/agency.
We are still conducting our business but with the safety & health of others and our team are the Highest Priority.
We ask anyone that has recently returned from overseas and if you are unwell to ensure you please do not attend an inspection.
We thank everyone for their co-operation during this time and please Stay Safe.

Description:
Family sized, close to Pacific Werribee and Cambridge Primary Zoned!
LJ Hooker Point Cook presents 8 Golden Fleece Place, Hoppers Crossing. Set in the heart of the Golden Square Estate within a quiet court, this home is not only blessed with a brilliantly central locale but also offers an abundance of space that most people only dream of. Zoned to Cambridge Primary School just over a kilometre away and with Pacific Werribee Shopping Centre also conveniently located close by as well as parklands and childcare options within walking distance.
- Comprising three living zones entailing a formal lounge, second family room and a separate rumpus/games room, there is plenty of space for the family to spend time together or find their own room to relax.
- The central kitchen offers modern appliances including a dishwasher and adjoins the sizeable meals room.
- Three great sized bedrooms are serviced by a central family bathroom, while ducted heating and split system cooling keep the home comfortable all year round.
- Outside, the lock up garage offers handy drive through access to the great sized private yard, while the pitched pergola is an ideal entertaining area for guests and family.
Here is your opportunity to snap up this fantastic property that would be ideal for the first home buyer, or a perfect property to add to your investment portfolio. Recently painted and ready now for its next lucky owner, we anticipate this one will not be around for long!
Note. All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Description:
Ultimate family living.
Secure, secluded and stylish. This sophisticated family residence delivers a supreme finish with breathtaking features that will exceed all expectations. Boasting four bedrooms, 2 beautiful bathrooms, superb formal lounge room and spectacular family living/dining enjoys an exterior leafy aspect. The magnificent kitchen features quality appliances including dishwasher, oven, cooktop, range hood, walk in pantry, plenty of bench space and storage options. This lovely warm and inviting home highlights an excellent family lifestyle with free-flowing living spaces and a stylish entertainment area. Outside is simply spectacular, providing sophisticated undercover entertaining with extensive concreting, stunningly designed and manicured gardens. This gorgeous home also features high ceilings, timber floors, ducted heating, alarm system, evaporative cooling, light fittings, window furnishings, oversize double remote garage with rear access and plenty of space for the kids to enjoy. All this set on a land size of approximately 626m2. This captivating family home is brilliantly designed, affording a dream family lifestyle. Located in a highly coveted Point Cook position, with parks, schools and transport all at your doorstep, and only a short walk to the Sanctuary Lakes shopping centre and a short drive to the Point Cook town centre, you will enjoy all of Point Cook's delights.

Take charge now for your chance to live in Upper Point Cook style!

Description:
Family abode with park views
LJ Hooker Point Cook presents 25 Creston Street, Point Cook. Brimming with luxurious inclusions and perfectly executed design, this stunning double-storey home must be inspected. Just two-years-young (approx) and built to exacting standards by Metricon Homes, this versatile family residence offers a true lifestyle experience, with parks and playgrounds at your doorstep. Tucked within the sought-after Upper Point Cook Estate, this home is nearby to local amenities including shops, schools and public transport.
- A celebration of contemporary style, this home begins with a captivating streetscape, elevated by sensational interior space. The open plan family and meals zones are surrounded by large windows and glass sliding doors, drawing the outdoors in and offering seamless indoor/outdoor living.
- The dream kitchen is timelessly elegant, with an expanse of stone bench tops and glossy white cabinetry. State-of-the-art appliances include a 900mm upright gas cooker, rangehood and dishwasher alongside a spacious walk-in-pantry, providing ample storage space. Enjoy casual meals at the breakfast bar, enhanced by pendant lighting and with garden views courtesy of the feature window.
- Offering superb versatility for a family, both levels of the home include a separate study space, each easily adapted to suit individual needs. Ideal as a playroom, music studio or craft space, the possibilities here are endless!
- The upper level is a peaceful retreat, offering four bedrooms including the master suite which includes a walk-in-robe and sophisticated en suite, complete with dual basins and stone bench tops. The remaining bedrooms are fitted with built-in-robes and are services by a central bathroom.
- The grounds offer low maintenance landscaping and a decked alfresco space which is the perfect place to enjoy a morning coffee.
- Additional appointments of this modern masterpiece include a double remote-control garage with internal access, separate laundry, ducted heating, split-system air conditioning, two linen cupboards and downstairs powder room.
Situated within the Upper Point Cook Estate, residents will enjoy all thats on offer in this sought-after neighbourhood. Quality schools including Point Cook College and Stella Maris Catholic Primary School offer excellent choice for students, while local shopping precincts include Point Cook Town Centre, Boardwalk Village and Featherbrook Shopping Centre. Those who love the great outdoors will appreciate the proximity to a plethora of local playgrounds, reserves and walking tracks, while a choice of public transportation options will please commuters.
Note. All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Description:
Flawless charm in Sunshine North Precinct
Full of warmth and character, this attractive and light-filled home in a well-established neighbourhood offers instant family appeal, around the corner from Northumberland Road shopping strip and many local schools. Introduced by a welcoming verandah, the flexible layout includes a huge open plan lounge/ family area warmed by an open fireplace, merging with a gourmet kitchen featuring a large breakfast bar that overlooks a separate dining room. The home is surrounded by three spacious bedrooms with built in robes, a bright family bathroom and spacious laundry. Highlights include ducted heating, air conditioning and 16 solar panels. A luxurious sense of space is enjoyed outside, with a large covered pergola ideal for alfresco entertaining, overlooking a huge lock up garage with mezzanine, double lock up carport and an expansive backyard that provides space for children and pets. Set on a vast allotment of approx. 613sqm with a wide drive way offering investors potential to further re develop (S.T.C.A). From this outstanding location, you'll be only a short walk to St Bernadettes and Sunshine North Primary Schools, Sunshine and Braybrook College, bus services and many parks including the Maribyrnong River Trail. Make this home yours today.
Insights: 14 Simpson Street, Sunshine North VIC 3020 was last sold in 2020 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Sunshine North have recently been sold.

Description:
A Location Not To Be Missed!
Sitting on a 529m2 allotment beautifully positioned from a family perspective within easy walking distances to schools, local amenities like easy access to the Princess freeway, Westbourne Grammar School, Truganina South Primary School, sports and recreational facilities, Williams Landing train station and Town Centre, this one of a kind home offers wonderful options for entertaining both inside & out in the desired suburb of Truganina.
Comprising of:
- Master Bedroom supported with its own ensuite & walk-in robes for comfort living.
- 3 bedrooms spacious bedrooms with built in robes.
- Separate formal dining area.
- Central formal living with plenty of natural light.
- Spacious central bathroom with separate toilet.
- Spacious kitchen with plenty of natural light with quality stainless steel appliances overlooking family dining & living area.
- Spacious backyard
Large sized laundry area with linen storage space, remote controlled double garage with internal access, centralized ducted heating, air-condition, downlights, blinds, separate central bathroom, and separate toilet.
This opportunity for a perfect home is not to be missed!
Contact: Asif 0414 260 235 OR Phea 0416 880 168

Description:
Titled And Ready to Build!
Aman Jadaun & Ray White Tarneit proudly present you this rare opportunity to build your dream home on this beautiful block of 448 m2 approx. With 14 metres frontage and 32 metres approx. deep ready to build. Its located Mt. Atkinson Estate, a fast growing and highly sought-after location in Truganina surrounded by all the amenities you could have.
Mt. Atkinson is a brand-new community in Truganina that will ultimately be home to up to 5,000 families. It's much more than a new community. It's a place to call home, designed to deliver job opportunities and every aspect of quality living including health care, education, connectivity, parks and amenities for an active lifestyle. Mt. Atkinson is a realization of the Australian dream with abundant space and opportunities to thrive and grow.
Design and build your dream home with design guidelines to protect your investment and create a beautiful place to live.
Call Am an on 0410 158 156 for further details, as this one won't last long.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Description:
MODERN LIVING IN A LOCATION OF CONVENIENCE
Well located and sophisticated living at its very best! This attractively designed 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom home with open space living is sure to impress all types of buyers from the moment you step through the front door. Within close proximity to Werribee CBD & Train Station (approx. 3.2km), Pacific Werribee Shopping Centre (approx. 3.1km), public transport, Aquapulse freeway access to reach Melbourne CBD within 30km, this home sets you in the centre of Werribees booming suburb.
This wonderful home offers the next lucky owner:
Vast master bedroom with walk in robe, ensuite and balcony
Two more further bedrooms both with built in robes
Open plan kitchen/meals and living space area
Hostess kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances
Adjoining lounge completes the open plan living zones
Polished timber floorboards throughout the living areas
Separate study at the front of the home
Central bathroom with separate toilet
Downstairs powder room
Single remote garage with drive through access
Quality appointments includes; 9ft ceilings, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, separate split system in bedroom 3 and ducted vacuum
(PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTION)
At YPA Estate Agents 'our service will move you'

Description:
listedAS - Lifestyle Living in Flawless Location with CITY VIEWS on TOP FLOOR
Hop Scotch and Shop Talk about location
Comprising of 2 bedrooms (master ensuites and BIR), separate bathroom, open plan kitchen and meals area, outdoor entertaining area with double balcony facing east and south WITH CITY VIEWS
Other features of this quality apartment include floorboards, 2.65m ceiling heights, LED lights, split-system heating and cooling, 600mm stainless steel appliances and more
Situated in one of Cairnlea's most convenient pockets, only footsteps from Cairnlea shopping Centre, Cairnlea Park Reserve, Schools, Public Transport, drive down to Brimbank shopping Centre and only a 18km drive down to the Heart of Melbourne CBD
Note: Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any pertinent matters

Description:
Elegant Period Home in Prized Locale
This delightful period home blends stylish character with inspirational flair and contemporary style. Offering an exceptional family environment in a most highly regarded pocket of central Sunshine. Within easy proximity to restaurants, shopping, transport, schools and parks providing a wonderful lifestyle backdrop for this outstanding home.
Classic charm merges perfectly with modern comfort through a superb interior, Boasting 3 large bedrooms, a renovated central bathroom, well appointed modern kitchen, open plan living and adjacent formal dining spaces highlighted by hardwood floors and Double French doors leading into the tranquil garden setting with a Northerly aspect ensuring the interior is always flooded by natural light.
Other features include ROW access to a tranquil and established garden plus a separate driveway with off street parking.
